title: 820-2936 black screen w/backlight but chimes
message:
820-2936 chimes but stays on black screen. check new screen, bios, checked pins on lvds and l9080. nothing works

thoughts? TIA

title: 820-2936 black screen w/backlight but chimes
message:
First put back original BIOS!

Diode mode on pins 4,6,7 with and without LCD connected.
SMC_LID high?

title: 820-2936 black screen w/backlight but chimes
message:
with plugged in 

4 0.37

6 0.47

7 0.52


without plugged in 

4 0.32

6 0.55

7 0.56

smc_lid is 3.3v and 0.54 diode

title: 820-2936 black screen w/backlight but chimes
message: Is there 3V on C9015, LCD connected of course.

title: 820-2936 black screen w/backlight but chimes
message: Then there must me backlight or some sort of image. Measure all LVDS lines on diode mode at the LVDS connector, LCD disconnected.

title: 820-2936 black screen w/backlight but chimes
message: there is backlight. no image though

title: 820-2936 black screen w/backlight but chimes
message: sorry i wasnt clear on that

title: 820-2936 black screen w/backlight but chimes
message: Answer the rest of my questions.

title: 820-2936 black screen w/backlight but chimes
message: If those values are without an LCD connected then it is either a bad LCD/LCD cable or connector.
